column4: Do anyone can help me Keyrings they started show up after restart.

that would be it
on moment please

you see by default the keyring associates your user password along with the keyring password.. as far as I know that has been depreciated but it seems to be what you are suffering with
if that method fails we will try something else
you are not making much sense.. also look here http://ubuntu-tutorials.com/2007/07/06/clearing-or-resetting-the-gnome-keyring/
